name: User Documentation
tooltip: Write, maintain and deploy LOC Documentation, the official user's guide for Logic Operating Centre (LOC)'s product features, code examples, release notes, SDK developer references and a web-based code generation/unit test tool, based on information provided by the product and developer teams.

name: Product White Paper Copywriting
tooltip: Write white papers for cryptocurrency-related FinTech products (Spot Trading and Margin Trading (including Grid Bot), Secured Loan, XREX Staking and DeFi Staking, BitCheck, Deposit and Withdraw) for regulation compliance and disclosure purposes, including product design objective, product features and user flow, terms of service/fee as well as risk management, based on information provided by the product team.
